name: Rowdies
description: Rowdies is a Latin display typeface inspired by the rough & tough Indian action cinema. Roughness and oddness of each individual letter contribute collectively as a typeface to the fantasy of being bold, fearless and strong. Designed by Jaikishan Patel for action, drama, adventure, thriller, noir & crime genres of storytelling. The font family includes 600+ glyphs in 3 weights; Light, Regular, and Bold. To contribute, see https://github.com/magictype/rowdies
author: Jaikishan Patel
